sentences.en: Ability to envision and apply appropriate materials and graphics to footwear.
sentences.cn: 富想象力,并能将适当的材料及绘图应用于鞋类设计.

sentences.en: Appropriate clothing and flat footwear should be worn at all times.
sentences.cn: 所有时候都应当穿着合身的衣服和平底鞋.

sentences.en: Be sure to wear the correct footwear to prevent injuries to your feet.
sentences.cn: 一定要穿合适的鞋，以免脚受伤。

sentences.en: But what is comfortable footwear? Here you will find the answer!
sentences.cn: 那怎么才是一双舒适的鞋子 呢 ?在这里,你可以找到答案!

sentences.en: Exports: textiles and footwear, asphalt, metals and metallic ores, crude oil.
sentences.cn: 出口: 纺织和鞋类, 沥青, 金属和金属矿, 原油.

sentences.en: Get your fine Corinthian footwear and your cat cheeks out of my face!
sentences.cn: 把你的科林斯靴子和你的猫脸从我的脸移开!

sentences.en: If you have a complaint about shoes bought from a shop covered by the Footwear Code, there are several ways of putting the matter right.
sentences.cn: 如果对在FootwearCode旗下零售店里买的鞋有不满意的地方，有几种解决问题的方式。

sentences.en: Player must wear approved sportswears with number, stockings, shinguards and footwear.
sentences.cn: 球员必须穿著合规格的号码球衣,球靴, 球袜及护胫作赛.

sentences.en: Products wanted: Footwear, fashion accessories, gifts and premiums, and other general goods.
sentences.cn: 需要货品: 鞋 、 服装时饰配件 、 礼品和精品及其他一般商品.

sentences.en: Some footballers get paid millions for endorsing footwear.
sentences.cn: 有些足球球员因为代言鞋类产品而得到几百万的报酬。

sentences.en: Specifications and test method for penetrating resistance of puncture proof footwear.
sentences.cn: 防刺穿鞋的抗刺穿技术条件及试验方法.

sentences.en: Versatile switch – Can test footwear and wrist straps.
sentences.cn: 切换式开关,可测试手环及脚环和鞋子.

sentences.en: We mainly trade in footwear, bags, clothing and other light industrial products.
sentences.cn: 公司经营各种鞋类 、 袋 、 装及其它轻工产品的进出口业务.

sentences.en: Wear loose clothing and sensible footwear.
sentences.cn: 穿上宽松的衣服和舒服的鞋子。

sentences.en: Xufeng Shoe's Mechanical always focuses on the requirements of footwear manufacturers.
sentences.cn: 峰旭鞋机重视制鞋业者的需求,精心设计多样化的制鞋设备以利业者生产.

trans.tran_en: things that people wear on their feet, such as shoes or boots
